description:
I scraped the data from [Pro Sports Transactions](https://www.prosportstransactions.com/basketball/Search/SearchResults.php?Player=&Team=&BeginDate=&EndDate=&ILChkBx=yes&Submit=Search) to curate a dataset for all IL moves since 1951.

For more information view my [GitHub repository](https://github.com/logan-lauton/nba_webscrape) with all of my NBA web scraping code!
title: NBA Injury Stats (1951 - 2023)
